snippet: Mike Emrick, NBC’s lead hockey announcer, called a game in Troy, Mich. The results were to be shown on a segment of “Rock Center.”
lead_paragraph: Mike Emrick, NBC’s lead hockey announcer, called a game in Troy, Mich. The results were to be shown on a segment of “Rock Center.”

headline.seo: Mike Emrick Calls a Girls’ 12-and-Under Game
headline.main: NBC Hockey Announcer Calls Girls’ 12-and-Under Game
